pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, April 17, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kitchener, Ontario

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Region of Waterloo mayors and Regional Chair Karen Redman, and deliver brief opening remarks.

Kitchener City Hall
200 King Street West

Notes for media:  

  • Open coverage of brief opening remarks
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Heritage Room no later than 9:15 a.m.
